name: AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme.instIsPreimmersionMapResidue
initialProofState:
X : AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme
x : ‚Üë‚ÜëX.toPresheafedSpace
‚ä¢ AlgebraicGeometry.IsPreimmersion (AlgebraicGeometry.Spec.map (X.residue x))
decl:
/-- See `AlgebraicGeometry.IsClosedImmersion.Spec_map_residue` for the stronger result that
`Spec.map (X.residue x)` is a closed immersion. -/
instance {X : Scheme.{u}} (x) : IsPreimmersion (Spec.map (X.residue x)) :=
  IsPreimmersion.mk_Spec_map
    (PrimeSpectrum.isClosedEmbedding_comap_of_surjective _ _
      Ideal.Quotient.mk_surjective).isEmbedding
    (RingHom.surjectiveOnStalks_of_surjective (Ideal.Quotient.mk_surjective))

name: AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme.Spec_map_residue_apply
initialProofState:
X : AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme
x : ‚Üë‚ÜëX.toPresheafedSpace
s : ‚Üë‚Üë(AlgebraicGeometry.Spec (X.residueField x)).toPresheafedSpace
‚ä¢ Eq ((AlgebraicGeometry.Spec.map (X.residue x)).base s) (IsLocalRing.closedPoint ‚Üë(X.presheaf.stalk x))
decl:
@[simp]
lemma Spec_map_residue_apply {X : Scheme.{u}} (x : X) (s : Spec (X.residueField x)) :
    (Spec.map (X.residue x)).base s = closedPoint (X.presheaf.stalk x) :=
  IsLocalRing.PrimeSpectrum.comap_residue _ s

initialProofState:

‚ä¢ Function.Surjective ‚áë(CategoryTheory.ConcreteCategory.hom (X.residue x))

lemma residue_surjective (X : Scheme.{u}) (x) : Function.Surjective (X.residue x) :=
  Ideal.Quotient.mk_surjective

name: AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme.instEpiCommRingCatResidue
initialProofState:

‚ä¢ Eq (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (X.residue x) (AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme.descResidueField f)) f

lemma residue_descResidueField {K : Type u} [Field K] {X : Scheme.{u}} {x}

  LocallyRingedSpace.evaluation_naturality f.1 ‚ü®x, hx‚ü©

X : AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme
x y : ‚Üë‚ÜëX.toPresheafedSpace
h : Eq x y
‚ä¢ Eq (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (AlgebraicGeometry.Spec.map (AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme.residueFieldCongr h).hom) (X.fromSpecResidueField x)) (X.fromSpecResidueField y)
decl:
@[reassoc (attr := simp)]
lemma residueFieldCongr_fromSpecResidueField {x y : X} (h : x = y) :
    Spec.map (X.residueFieldCongr h).hom ‚â´ X.fromSpecResidueField _ =
      X.fromSpecResidueField _ := by
  subst h; simp

‚ä¢ Eq (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (AlgebraicGeometry.Spec.map (AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme.Hom.residueFieldMap f x)) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (Y.fromSpecResidueField (f.base x)) h)) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (X.fromSpecResidueField x) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp f h))
decl:
@[reassoc (attr := simp)]
lemma Hom.Spec_map_residueFieldMap_fromSpecResidueField (x : X) :

name: AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme.fromSpecResidueField_apply
initialProofState:
X : AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme
x : ‚Üë‚ÜëX.toPresheafedSpace
s : ‚Üë‚Üë(AlgebraicGeometry.Spec (X.residueField x)).toPresheafedSpace
‚ä¢ Eq ((X.fromSpecResidueField x).base s) x
decl:
@[simp]
lemma fromSpecResidueField_apply (x : X.carrier) (s : Spec (X.residueField x)) :
    (X.fromSpecResidueField x).base s = x := by
  simp [fromSpecResidueField]

name: AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme.range_fromSpecResidueField
initialProofState:
X : AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme
x : ‚Üë‚ÜëX.toPresheafedSpace
‚ä¢ Eq (Set.range ‚áë(X.fromSpecResidueField x).base) (Singleton.singleton x)
decl:
lemma range_fromSpecResidueField (x : X.carrier) :
    Set.range (X.fromSpecResidueField x).base = {x} := by
  ext s
  simp only [Set.mem_range, fromSpecResidueField_apply, Set.mem_singleton_iff, eq_comm (a := s)]
  constructor
  ¬∑ rintro ‚ü®-, h‚ü©
    exact h
  ¬∑ rintro rfl
    exact ‚ü®closedPoint (X.residueField x), rfl‚ü©

name: AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme.descResidueField_fromSpecResidueField
initialProofState:
K : Type u_1
inst‚úù¬π : Field K
X : AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme
x : ‚Üë‚ÜëX.toPresheafedSpace
f : Quiver.Hom (X.presheaf.stalk x) (CommRingCat.of K)
inst‚úù : IsLocalHom (CommRingCat.Hom.hom f)
‚ä¢ Eq (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (AlgebraicGeometry.Spec.map (AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme.descResidueField f)) (X.fromSpecResidueField x)) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (AlgebraicGeometry.Spec.map f) (X.fromSpecStalk x))
decl:
lemma descResidueField_fromSpecResidueField {K : Type*} [Field K] (X : Scheme) {x}
    (f : X.presheaf.stalk x ‚ü∂ .of K) [IsLocalHom f.hom] :
    Spec.map (X.descResidueField f) ‚â´
      X.fromSpecResidueField x = Spec.map f ‚â´ X.fromSpecStalk x := by
  simp [fromSpecResidueField, ‚Üê Spec.map_comp_assoc]

name: AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme.descResidueField_stalkClosedPointTo_fromSpecResidueField
initialProofState:
K : Type u
inst‚úù : Field K
X : AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme
f : Quiver.Hom (AlgebraicGeometry.Spec (CommRingCat.of K)) X
‚ä¢ Eq (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (AlgebraicGeometry.Spec.map (AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme.descResidueField (AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme.stalkClosedPointTo f))) (X.fromSpecResidueField (f.base (IsLocalRing.closedPoint K)))) f
decl:
lemma descResidueField_stalkClosedPointTo_fromSpecResidueField
    (K : Type u) [Field K] (X : Scheme.{u}) (f : Spec (.of K) ‚ü∂ X) :
    Spec.map (@descResidueField (CommRingCat.of K) _ X _ (Scheme.stalkClosedPointTo f)
        _) ‚â´
      X.fromSpecResidueField (f.base (closedPoint K)) = f := by
  rw [X.descResidueField_fromSpecResidueField]
  rw [Scheme.Spec_stalkClosedPointTo_fromSpecStalk]

name: AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme.SpecToEquivOfField_eq_iff
initialProofState:
K : Type u_1
inst‚úù : Field K
X : AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme
f‚ÇÅ f‚ÇÇ : Sigma fun x => Quiver.Hom (X.residueField x) (CommRingCat.of K)
‚ä¢ Iff (Eq f‚ÇÅ f‚ÇÇ) (Exists fun e => Eq f‚ÇÅ.snd (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme.residueFieldCongr e).hom f‚ÇÇ.snd))
decl:
/-- A helper lemma to work with `AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme.SpecToEquivOfField`. -/
lemma SpecToEquivOfField_eq_iff {K : Type*} [Field K] {X : Scheme}
    {f‚ÇÅ f‚ÇÇ : Œ£ x : X.carrier, X.residueField x ‚ü∂ .of K} :
    f‚ÇÅ = f‚ÇÇ ‚Üî ‚àÉ e : f‚ÇÅ.1 = f‚ÇÇ.1, f‚ÇÅ.2 = (X.residueFieldCongr e).hom ‚â´ f‚ÇÇ.2 := by
  constructor
  ¬∑ rintro rfl
    simp
  ¬∑ obtain ‚ü®f, _‚ü© := f‚ÇÅ
    obtain ‚ü®g, _‚ü© := f‚ÇÇ
    rintro ‚ü®(rfl : f = g), h‚ü©
    simpa
